price: Alif-Lam-Ra. Dies sind die Zeichen des Buches und eines deutlichen Qur’ans.
arabic: الٓرۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَقُرۡءَانٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: alif-lam-ra til'ka āyātu al-kitābi waqur'ānin mubīnin
